section_title: Miscellaneous and consequential amendments and repeals.
section_text: 15 1 The enactments specified in Schedule 3 to this Act shall have effect subject to the amendments set out in that Schedule, being miscellaneous amendments and amendments consequential on the provisions of this Act. 2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

17 1 This Act may be cited as the Housing Rents and Subsidies (Scotland) Act 1975. 2 The Housing (Scotland) Acts 1966 to 1974 and this Act (except sections 6 to 13) may be cited together as the Housing (Scotland) Acts 1966 to 1975. 3 The Rent (Scotland) Acts 1971 to 1974 and sections 7 to 11 of this Act may be cited together as the Rent (Scotland) Acts 1971 to 1975. 4 This Act shall come into force on 16th May 1975. 5 With the exception of this section, and section 15 of this Act so far as relating to paragraph 17 of Schedule 3 to this Act (which extend also to England and Wales), this Act extends to Scotland only.
